summary: A mute make-up artist working on a slasher movie being shot in Moscow, is locked in the studio after hours. While there, she witnesses a brutal murder, and must escape capture.
cast: Marina Zudina|Fay Ripley|Evan Richards|Oleg Yankovskiy|Igor Volkov|Sergei Karlenkov|Alec Guinness|Aleksandr Pyatkov|Nikolai Pastukhov|Aleksandr Bureyev|Stephen Bouser|Valeri Barakhtin|Nikolay Chindyaykin|Vyacheslav Naumenko|Larisa Khusnullina|Olga Tolstetskaya|Denis Karasyov|Igor Ilin|Oleg Abramov|Yuriy Sherstnyov|Lyudmila Makeeva|Vladimir Salnikov|Sascha Buchman|Natalya Polyushkina|Konstantin Sitnikov|Regina Peter|Pete Drummond|Norbert Soentgen
title: Testigo mudo
